What must you _ when you receive a present for your birthday? You have to sit down and write a thank-you letter. The words "Thank you" are very important. We have to use them often. We say them  when someone gives us a drink, helps us to pick up things, hands us a letter, lends us a book, gives us a book or a present.
 Another important word is "please". Many people forget to use it. It is not polite to ask someone to do something _ saying "please". We have to use it when we  ask for  something, too. It may be a book or a pencil, more rice or more tea. It may be used in the classroom, at home, at the bus stop or in a shop. We have to use "please" to make each  other _ .
We have to _ to say "sorry" too. When we have hurt someone, we go up and say we are _  . When we have told lie ( ) and feel sorry, we use the same word. When we have forgotten something or broken something, we use the word "sorry", too. "Sorry" is a word that can make people forget wrongs.
